Hi there,
I am a developer working on a web application which utilizes Struts as the
controller and Spring to do dependency injection at the Data Access Objects
layer.
I want to introduce unit tests in the application.

The current design of the application is as follows



JavaScript/Jsps/ ----> Struts Action Forms and Struts Action Classes -->
Service Class usually has most of the logic ---> DAO objects (automatically
generated by ibatis a hibernate like framework)---> Sql Maps --> Database


I am currently writing test cases for the Service Class which involves a lot
of database transactions. Also, if I instead use StrutsTestCase and test the
actions instead would that make any difference or should I try both test on
the Action classes and the Service classes.


Is anyone using unit testing in an application like the one above, any
feedback is appreciated.

Thanks, Kazam.
